CustomField.description: Total Estimated Price (Estimated quantity multiplied by estimated unit price)
CustomField.formula: IF(Billable_Quantity__c > 0, Billable_Quantity__c * Estimated_Price2__c - (Discount__c*(Billable_Quantity__c * Estimated_Price2__c)), Estimated_Quantity2__c * Estimated_Price2__c - (Discount__c*(Estimated_Quantity2__c * Estimated_Price2__c)))
CustomField.label: Total Estimated Price
